description: Slim-fitting shirt made from lightweight slub cotton. Printed with a floral motif inspired by an antique bandanna. Western-style front and back yokes. Metal concho button at the neck. Heavily laundered for a vintage look and feel.
fitting_details: Western Fit: Double RL's slimmest shirt silhouette. Cut trim through the body and the sleeves.
Size medium has a 30.5" back body length, an 18" shoulder, a 42.75" chest, and a 34.75" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 1" between sizes.
Point collar with a metal concho button at the front. Snapped placket. Western-style front and back yokes.
Long sleeves with snapped barrel cuffs.
